comment.name: Sample_description
comment.value: 3 days 4 deg C. 70% EtOH, 0.05% Tween-20. Wash 100% EtOH., Air dry. Plants were plated onto 0.5xMS media, 1% agar, 0.6% sucrose medium and stratified at 4 deg C for 3 days. Seedlings were transferred to soil after 7 days and grown under standard short day conditions.  Levingtons F2 + Sand + Perlite + Intercept  70% EtOH, 0.05% Tween-20  6 plants / 8 x 12 cm pot twice weekly 21 C average, 21 C day, 21 C night 76 % average, 85 % day, 60 % night Murashige & Skoog basal salt mixture. Modifications: 0.6% sugar and 1% agar.

comment.name: genetic variation
comment.value: T-DNA knock out mutation in At1g55350
